meanings.definition: A person who gives advice or guidance, especially in a professional or therapeutic setting.
meanings.sent1: The counsellors at the school help students with their problems.
meanings.sent2: The hospital has trained counsellors to support patients during difficult times.
meanings.sent3: The group of counsellors decided to wear matching hats to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent4: She saw the counsellors as beacons of hope in a sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The wise counsellors whispered words of comfort to those in need.

meanings.definition: A member of a council or advisory body.
meanings.sent1: The counsellors gathered to discuss the new community project.
meanings.sent2: The counsellors voted on the proposed changes to the local laws.
meanings.sent3: One of the counsellors accidentally spilled coffee on the mayor during the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The counsellors stood like pillars of strength in times of crisis.
meanings.sent5: The counsellors' unity was as solid as a rock in the face of adversity.
